programme.title: The Gilded Age
programme.desc: Un invitado inesperado asiste a la gala de recaudación de fondos de Bertha para la Metropolitan Opera; Agnes, por su parte, apoya la lucha de la señora Astor por la Academia de Música.

programme.title: The Gilded Age
programme.desc: Bertha recibe noticias descorazonadoras de Met. Ada teme que su hermana desapruebe sus encuentros con el Sr. Forte, así que le pide a Marian que la encubra.

programme.title: The Gilded Age
programme.desc: Mientras Ada se pregunta si debe seguir adelante sin el apoyo de su hermana, Agnes se enfrenta a la perspectiva de vivir sola. En Newport, Bertha da los últimos toques al evento de la temporada mientras la señora Winterton trama su venganza.

programme.title: The Gilded Age
programme.desc: George va a Pittsburgh para encargarse de la inminente huelga. Bertha descubre que el Duque volverá para la noche de estreno de la Metropolitan Opera. Bannister intenta recuperar una carta incriminatoria de la casa Russell.

programme.title: The Gilded Age
programme.desc: Bertha reconsidera su lealtad al Met. Peggy se esfuerza por marcar la diferencia en Brooklyn. George llega a un acuerdo con el Sr. Henderson. Oscar hace un descubrimiento alarmante y la salud de Luke se deteriora.

programme.title: The Gilded Age
programme.sub-title: In Terms of Winning and Losing
programme.desc: El staff cuestiona su futuro en la casa de Rhijn, mientras que Peggy duda sobre su futuro en The New York Globe. Marian confiesa sus sentimientos a Dashiell.

programme.title: Marcella Arguello: Bitch, Grow Up!
programme.desc: Un especial de comedia stand up de Marcella en el Roulette Intermedium, en Brooklyn, Nueva York.

programme.title: Princess Cut
programme.desc: Dos mujeres muy distintas forman una amistad, hasta que una de ellas dice una mentira.

programme.title: Blanes esquina Müller
programme.desc: Un hombre encuentra a su doble en su propio hogar. Sin embargo, no es un doble, sino un otro yo encargado de advertirle lo que puede depararle el futuro.

programme.title: Farruko: En letra de otro
programme.desc: El reguetonero Farruko comparte su intimidad y lo más destacado de su faceta musical.

programme.title: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels
programme.desc: En la Riviera francesa, un estafador estadounidense y su rival británico convierten a una inocente heredera en su objetivo.

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: Durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial, el genio inglés Alan Turing intenta descifrar el código alemán enigma con la ayuda de otros matemáticos.

programme.title: Lady Bird
programme.desc: Marion McPherson, una enfermera de California, trabaja incansablemente para sustentar a su familia desde que su esposo quedó desempleado. Marion tiene problemas con su hija adolescente, de inclinaciones artísticas y temperamento fuerte.

programme.title: A Different Man
programme.desc: Un aspirante a actor se somete a un procedimiento médico radical para transformar drásticamente su apariencia. Pero su nuevo rostro soñado se convierte en una pesadilla a medida que se obsesiona con recuperar lo que perdió.

programme.title: Mrs. Doubtfire
programme.desc: Luego de divorciarse, un actor sin trabajo se disfraza de niñera anciana para pasar más tiempo con su familia.

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: Michelle Darnell, una titán de la industria, es enviada a prisión por tráfico de información privilegiada. Después de cumplir su condena, busca reinventarse, pero no todos la perdonan rápidamente.

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: Michelle Darnell, una titán de la industria, es enviada a prisión por tráfico de información privilegiada. Después de cumplir su condena, busca reinventarse, pero no todos la perdonan rápidamente.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: Cuando se transforma en hombre lobo, el tímido Scott Howard pasa a ser la estrella del equipo de baloncesto y el chico más popular de la escuela secundaria.

programme.title: Venus and Serena
programme.desc: Los cineastas Maiken Baird y Michelle Major siguen a las hermanas y tenistas campeonas Venus y Serena Williams dentro y fuera de las canchas mientras ambas luchan contra los problemas de salud y la controversia en los medios de comunicación.

programme.title: She's Out of My League
programme.desc: Kirk es un tipo muy simple que trabaja en el aeropuerto. Sin embargo, un día conoce casualmente a la despampanante Molly, una chica que no parece estar a su alcance, pero que, poco a poco, empieza a concederle citas.

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: Apocalipsis, el mutante más poderoso, despierta tras miles de años de letargo y pretende destruir a toda la humanidad. Sólo un grupo de jóvenes mutantes, dirigidos por el Profesor X y Mística, podrán impedirlo.

programme.title: King in the Wilderness
programme.desc: Un retrato de Martin Luther King Jr. durante los últimos años de su vida, desde su participación en la Ley de Derechos Electorales de 1965 hasta su asesinato en 1968.

programme.title: Silver Linings Playbook
programme.desc: Una relación inesperada empieza a formarse entre un hombre que está intentando reconstruir su vida y una joven mujer que le ha prometido ayudarlo a reunirse con su esposa alejada.

programme.title: Uncharted: Fuera del mapa
programme.desc: El cazador de tesoros Victor Sullivan recluta a Nathan Drake para que lo ayude a recuperar una fortuna de 500 años de antigüedad. Lo que comienza como un atraco se convierte en una competencia contra el despiadado Santiago Moncada.

programme.title: Marshall
programme.desc: Thurgood Marshall se enfrenta a uno de los desafíos más importantes de su carrera como abogado de la asociación NAACP. Marshall se encarga de defender a un chofer negro, a quien una rica señora blanca ha acusado de violación e intento de asesinato.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: Dos hombres intentan detener un tren fuera de control que transporta un cargamento tóxico, poniendo en peligro la vida de miles de personas.

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: La historia de como seis chicos de Compton, uno de los barrios más peligrosos de Los Ángeles formaron el grupo de rap N.W.A. y revolucionaron no sólo el mundo de la música, sino toda la sociedad estadounidense a finales de los años 80.

programme.title: Hard Knocks: In Season With the AFC North
programme.desc: La batalla por la corona de la AFC Norte durante las últimas seis semanas de la temporada de la NFL. Una carrera de playoffs para el ganador de la división y cualquier equipo Wild Card de la AFC Norte.

programme.title: Joker: Folie à Deux
programme.desc: El comediante fracasado Arthur Fleck tropieza con el amor verdadero mientras está encarcelado en Arkham. A la espera del juicio por el asesinato de cinco personas, Fleck descubre la música que siempre ha estado dentro de él.

programme.title: The Express
programme.desc: Under the guidance of Syracuse University football coach Ben Schwartzwalder, Ernie Davis overcomes poverty and prejudice to become the first black man to win the Heisman Trophy.

programme.title: Immortals
programme.desc: A Greek stonemason named Theseus (Henry Cavill) revolts against a bloodthirsty king who wants to throw the gods out of Olympus and become master of the world.

programme.title: Everybody Wants to Be Italian
programme.desc: A lovelorn Polish fishmonger (Jay Jablonski) lies about his ethnicity to woo a beautiful Italian veterinarian (Cerina Vincent).

programme.title: World's Greatest Dad
programme.desc: A high-school poetry teacher (Robin Williams) is also a single father and dreams of becoming a successful writer, but a freak accident leads to both tragedy and opportunity.

programme.title: The Extra Man
programme.desc: A flamboyant literature professor (Kevin Kline), who escorts rich old women on the side, teaches his cross-dressing roommate (Paul Dano) his unique perspective on life.

programme.title: Swiss Army Man
programme.desc: Stranded on a deserted island, a young man (Paul Dano) embarks on a journey back to civilization with a talking, flatulent corpse (Daniel Radcliffe).

programme.title: Criminal
programme.desc: Hoping to stop a diabolical plot, the CIA implants the memories and skills of a dead agent (Ryan Reynolds) into the mind of a dangerous convict (Kevin Costner).

programme.title: It Comes at Night
programme.desc: After a mysterious apocalypse leaves the world with few survivors, two families are forced to share a home in an uneasy alliance to keep the outside evil at bay -- only to learn that the true horror may come from within.

programme.title: The Amityville Horror
programme.desc: Strange events take place after a family (Ryan Reynolds, Melissa George, Jesse James) moves into a new house that was the site of several gruesome murders.

programme.title: Birds of Prey (and the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn)
programme.desc: Harley Quinn faces the wrath of narcissistic crime boss Black Mask and every other thug in Gotham. But things soon even out for Harley when she becomes unexpected allies with three deadly women -- Huntress, Black Canary and Renee Montoya.

programme.title: The Last House on the Left
programme.desc: After their daughter is assaulted and left for dead, a couple (Tony Goldwyn, Monica Potter) take revenge on the assailants, who have taken shelter at the couple's house.

programme.title: Pulse
programme.desc: Bewildered residents (Haruhiko Katô, Kumiko Asô, Koyuki) of Tokyo investigate strange events linked to computers and the Internet.

programme.title: Sweet Dreams
programme.desc: Country singer Patsy Cline (Jessica Lange) puts up with her husband (Ed Harris) and life on the road, on her way to tragic stardom.

programme.title: The Secrets We Keep
programme.desc: In post-World War II America, a woman, rebuilding her life in the suburbs with her husband, kidnaps her neighbor and seeks vengeance for the heinous war crimes she believes he committed against her.

programme.title: The Lodge
programme.desc: During a family retreat to a remote winter cabin, a man leaves his two children in the care of his new girlfriend, Grace. Isolated and alone, a blizzard traps them inside the lodge as terrifying events summon specters from Grace's dark past.

programme.title: The Lodge
programme.desc: During a family retreat to a remote winter cabin, a man leaves his two children in the care of his new girlfriend, Grace. Isolated and alone, a blizzard traps them inside the lodge as terrifying events summon specters from Grace's dark past.

programme.title: The Revenant
programme.desc: In 1823, fur trapper Hugh Glass (Leonardo DiCaprio) treks through the snowy wilderness to track down John Fitzgerald (Tom Hardy), a member of his hunting team who killed his young son (Forrest Goodluck) and left him for dead.

programme.title: The Glass Castle
programme.desc: Based on a memoir, four children struggle to grow up in a rambling, poverty-stricken, wildly unconventional environment overseen by their dysfunctional yet uniquely loving parents.

programme.title: Switch
programme.desc: The playboy victim of a hot-tub murder returns as a sexy woman (Ellen Barkin) but with the same old sexist-male mind.

programme.title: American Renegades
programme.desc: On assignment in war-torn Europe, Navy SEALs discover gold at the bottom of a lake -- a fortune rumored to be worth hundreds of millions of dollars. When the enemy detects the team, the SEALs are left with only 10 hours to recover the treasure.

programme.title: The Knick
programme.desc: Dr. Edwards lobbies to be appointed chief of surgery; Dr. Gallinger refuses to return as Edwards' subordinate; Lucy's attempts to make amends with Bertie are rebuffed; Cleary schemes to make extra money.

programme.title: The Knick
programme.desc: Dr. Thackery sets his sights on a return to the Knick; Cornelia enlists Cleary to do a dirty job; Bertie makes a change; Robertson pushes a new subway initiative; Barrow drives up construction costs; an unexpected visitor surprises Lucy.

programme.title: The Knick
programme.sub-title: The Best With the Best to Get the Best
programme.desc: Thackery enlists Edwards to help him test a new hypothesis; Lucy learns that confession is not always good for the soul; a young journalist works on a story about one of Thackery's rivals; Barrow faces a new adversary at Tammany Hall.

programme.title: The Knick
programme.desc: Abby's worsening condition persuades Thackery to test out his novel syphilis treatment; Edwards comes clean to Opal but is surprised at her response; Cornelia probes a suspicious death.

programme.title: The Knick
programme.desc: The Knick faces an influx of patients following a subway explosion; Lucy takes advice from one of Ping Wu's girls; Thackery tests out his latest theory on addiction; Genevieve charms the Chickerings.

programme.title: Love & Other Drugs
programme.desc: A pharmaceutical salesman (Jake Gyllenhaal) begins a tempestuous romance with a free-spirited Parkinson's patient (Anne Hathaway).

programme.title: Moonlight
programme.desc: A look at three defining chapters in the life of Chiron, a young black man growing up in Miami. His epic journey to manhood is guided by the kindness, support and love of the community that helps raise him.

programme.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
programme.desc: When an interdimensional rupture unravels reality, an unlikely hero must channel her newfound powers to fight bizarre and bewildering dangers from the multiverse.

programme.title: Bleed for This
programme.desc: With help from trainer Kevin Rooney (Aaron Eckhart), champion boxer Vinny Pazienza (Miles Teller) tries to make a comeback after breaking his neck in a car accident.

programme.title: The Curse of La Llorona
programme.desc: Ignoring the eerie warning of a troubled mother, a social worker and her own children are drawn into a frightening supernatural realm. Their only hope of surviving the legendary ghost La Llorona is a disillusioned priest who practices mysticism.

programme.title: Black Adam
programme.desc: Bestowed with the almighty powers of the gods, Black Adam's unique form of justice, born out of rage, is challenged by modern-day heroes who form the Justice Society: Hawkman, Dr. Fate, Atom Smasher and Cyclone.

programme.title: Black Adam
programme.desc: Bestowed with the almighty powers of the gods, Black Adam's unique form of justice, born out of rage, is challenged by modern-day heroes who form the Justice Society: Hawkman, Dr. Fate, Atom Smasher and Cyclone.

programme.title: Justice League: Doom
programme.desc: Vandal Savage uses stolen information from Batman's secret files to mastermind a plan to exterminate the Justice League.

programme.title: Justice League: The Flashpoint Paradox
programme.desc: The Flash causes a temporal ripple that creates a fractured reality where the Justice league has never formed, Superman does not exist and a war rages between Wonder Woman and Aquaman. Flash teams with Batman and Cyborg to restore the timeline.

programme.title: Justice League: War
programme.desc: Superman (Alan Tudyk), Wonder Woman (Michelle Monaghan), Batman (Jason O'Mara) and other superheroes join forces to save Earth from Darkseid.

programme.title: Justice League: Throne of Atlantis
programme.desc: Aquaman (Matt Lanter) is forced to choose between the Justice League and Atlantis when Atlantean warriors invade Gotham City and Metropolis.

programme.title: Justice League Dark: Apokolips War
programme.desc: Following the decimation of Earth, the Justice League regroups to take on Darkseid and save the remaining survivors.

programme.title: Batman: The Killing Joke
programme.desc: Batman (Kevin Conroy) must save Commissioner Gordon (Ray Wise) from the Joker's (Mark Hamill) twisted quest to drive him insane.

programme.title: Injustice
programme.desc: Based on the critically-acclaimed video game and graphic novel, "Injustice" unleashes an all-out war fought by DC's mightiest.

programme.title: Justice League: Warworld
programme.desc: Kidnapped and transported to a strange world, Batman, Superman and Wonder Woman unite to form a resistance and lead the planet to freedom.

programme.title: Batman: The Doom That Came to Gotham
programme.desc: Bruce Wayne returns to Gotham City and learns of a sinister doomsday cult planning its destruction. Bruce must don the mantle of Batman to fight against ancient magic foes and fiery demons while guarding his sanity against the Old Gods' corruption.

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: Hard-drinking country music star Jackson Maine discovers -- and falls in love with -- a struggling but talented singer named Ally. As her career quickly takes off, Jackson starts to realize that his best days may be behind him.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: Torn apart from her sister and her children, Celie faces many hardships, including an abusive husband. With support from a singer and her stepdaughter, she ultimately finds extraordinary strength in the unbreakable bonds of a new kind of sisterhood.

programme.title: Viva
programme.desc: A young hairdresser (Héctor Medina) clashes with his estranged father (Jorge Perugorría) when his dream of performing in drag comes true.

programme.title: The Blackcoat's Daughter
programme.desc: During the dead of winter, a troubled young woman (Emma Roberts) embarks on a mysterious journey to an isolated prep school where two stranded students (Kiernan Shipka, Lucy Boynton) face a sinister threat from an unseen evil force.

programme.title: Inherent Vice
programme.desc: A dope-smoking private detective (Joaquin Phoenix) navigates a psychedelic world of surfers, rockers, stoners, LAPD cops and more as he looks for a missing ex-girlfriend and her wealthy boyfriend.

programme.title: Inherent Vice
programme.desc: A dope-smoking private detective (Joaquin Phoenix) navigates a psychedelic world of surfers, rockers, stoners, LAPD cops and more as he looks for a missing ex-girlfriend and her wealthy boyfriend.

programme.title: The Last Emperor
programme.desc: Named Emperor of China at age 3 in 1908, Pu Yi (John Lone) becomes a prisoner of destiny.

programme.title: Black Christmas
programme.desc: As sorority sisters prepare for holiday parties, a mysterious cloaked figure starts to leave a bloody trail throughout their campus. Refusing to become victims, the girls decide to band together and fight back against the psychotic Christmas killer.

programme.title: Fruitvale Station
programme.desc: Flashbacks reveal the last day in the life of Oscar Grant (Michael B. Jordan), a young man shot dead during an altercation with California police.

programme.title: Monsters and Men
programme.desc: Tensions rise when a young man records a police officer shooting a black motorist in a Brooklyn, N.Y., neighborhood.

programme.title: The Hole in the Ground
programme.desc: One night, Sarah's young son disappears into the woods behind their rural home. When he returns, he looks the same, but his behavior grows increasingly disturbing. Sarah begins to believe that the boy who returned may not be her son at all.

programme.title: The Monster
programme.desc: Left stranded after their car breaks down, a woman (Zoe Kazan) and her daughter (Ella Ballentine) must fight for survival when a terrifying monster attacks them on a deserted road near the woods.

programme.title: Dream Scenario
programme.desc: A family man finds his life turned upside down when millions of strangers suddenly start seeing him in their dreams. However, when his nighttime appearances take a nightmarish turn, he's forced to navigate the consequences of his newfound stardom.

programme.title: The Curse of La Llorona
programme.desc: Ignoring the eerie warning of a troubled mother, a social worker and her own children are drawn into a frightening supernatural realm. Their only hope of surviving the legendary ghost La Llorona is a disillusioned priest who practices mysticism.

programme.title: Troll Hunter
programme.desc: While investigating reports of illegal poaching, three student filmmakers encounter a man (Otto Jespersen) who slays trolls for the Norwegian government.

programme.title: The Last Black Man in San Francisco
programme.desc: Jimmie and his best friend Mont try to reclaim the house built by Jimmie's grandfather, launching them on a poignant odyssey that connects them to their past, even as it tests their friendship and sense of belonging in the place they call home.

programme.title: The Kill Team
programme.desc: When a young U.S. soldier in Afghanistan witnesses other recruits killing civilians under the direction of a sadistic sergeant, he begins to fear that the men he's serving with might be the ones to kill him.

programme.title: Swiss Army Man
programme.desc: Stranded on a deserted island, a young man (Paul Dano) embarks on a journey back to civilization with a talking, flatulent corpse (Daniel Radcliffe).

programme.title: Marianne & Leonard: Words of Love
programme.desc: A story of enduring love between Leonard Cohen and his Norwegian muse, Marianne Ihlen. Filmmaker Nick Broomfield chronicles their relationship, from the early days in Greece to how their love evolved when Leonard became a successful musician.

programme.title: ECCO
programme.desc: A former covert assassin seeks redemption by hunting the people responsible for his sinful past.

programme.title: All the Money in the World
programme.desc: In 1973, kidnappers demand $17 million from billionaire J. Paul Getty in exchange for his grandson's release. When Getty refuses to pay, his former daughter-in-law and adviser become unlikely allies in a race against time to save the teen's life.

programme.title: Blood Brother
programme.desc: A recently released convict takes murderous revenge against his childhood friends who let him take the fall for their crimes.

programme.title: The Ministry of Ungentlemanly Warfare
programme.desc: Made up of a motley crew of rogues and mavericks, a top-secret combat unit uses unconventional techniques to neutralize Hitler's fleet of German U-boats during World War II.

programme.desc: Four years after the destruction of Isla Nublar, dinosaurs now live and hunt alongside humans all over the world. This fragile balance will reshape the future and determine, once and for all, whether human beings are to remain the apex predators.

programme.title: Retribution
programme.desc: While driving with his two kids, a man receives a phone call from an unknown assailant who claims there is a bomb in the car. Unable to exit the vehicle, he must now follow a series of twisted instructions while trying to figure out how to survive.
